Arey zara suniye', 'Aapne jo gussa dikhaya', '
Pyar hume gusse pe aaya', '
Aapne jo gussa dikhaya', '
Pyar hume gusse pe aaya', '
Lot aaiye man jaiye', '
Aaj an kijiye koi bahana', '
Bhiga bhiga mausam suhana', '
Kahta hai', '
Aji zara rukiye', '

Arey zara suniye', 'Tir ke hai samne nishana', '

Haye tir ke hai samne nishana', '
Sikh lije dil ka lagana', '

Kahta hai', '
Aji zara rukiye', '
Arey zara suniye', '
Haye ai zara hoye hoye aji zara', '
